content: Hello! here we publish our offers for low-cost VPS servers where you can pay with Crypto.70~50% discount based on our main price listings:https://ginernet.com/en/vps-leb/All servers include a 10 Gbps port (shared with the rest of the VPS on the same node).LEB-2GCPU: 1 x 2.40 GHzMemory: 2 GB RAMStorage: 25 GB NVMeTraffic: 2 TB/month3.95 €/monthORDER NOWLEB-4GCPU: 2 x 2.40 GHzMemory: 4 GB RAMStorage: 50 GB NVMeTraffic: 4 TB/month6.95 €/monthORDER NOWLEB-8GCPU: 4 x 2.40 GHzMemory: 8 GB RAMStorage: 100 GB NVMeTraffic: 8 TB/month12.95 €/monthORDER NOWDataCenter: Interxion @ Madrid (Spain)Virtualization: KVMControl panel: GridCPNetwork: BGP AS59432Looking Glass: http://lg.ginernet.com/Backup: Daily offsite automated and on demandIPv4 extra: 2 €/monthIPv4 Voxility DDoS protected: 3 €/monthIPv4 Path.net DDoS protected: 3 €/monthI remain at your disposal to answer your questions!I'm sure you will like to see some pictures of our racks, here they are. We are especially proud of our set of 2 Juniper MX204 routers, which together with the Arista switches give us an amazing network stability.https://ginernet.cdnbox.net/images/added/1668285815.jpeghttps://ginernet.cdnbox.net/images/added/1668285826.jpegGINERNET
